Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi,

I have recently installed heritrix-1.14.3 in my system over fedora 12.
However when I
try to run it via the start script "$HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix", it just
goes in the infinite loop printing dots. I looked in the script and it looks
like it should create the "heritrix_dmesg.log" file in $HERITRIX_HOME which
is also not created. What could be the issue ?

Regards,
Vaibhav

--00c09f88caa45a25340486189d37
